snippet.title: Tin Hearts VR - Official Trailer | Upload VR Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Guide a troop of soldiers through a magical toy-filled world in narrative puzzle adventure game, Tin Hearts. Created by members of the Fable team, Tin Hearts has been rebuilt from the ground up for VR. Here's a quick look at what's to come in this new trailer. Tin Hearts is coming to PS VR2, PC VR, and Meta Quest 2.
